description: She is an ice-based demon who acts as the partner of Enma in their endeavour to return the escaped demons to the underworld. In the OVA, while she has a cold personality and certain disdain for Enma on the surface, she actually is in love with him but knows and regrets that they cannot be together since they are opposing forces (Ice/Flame). Her name means snow devil princess and its probably related to the Japanese folklore myth of Yuki-onna.
name: Yukihime
